Rooms.Name: atrium
Rooms.LongDescription: A beautiful atrium with sun pouring through the glass ceiling. Benches line the walls beneath hanging plants.

Rooms.Name: side-room
Rooms.Description: A small side-room for drinking coffee.
Rooms.LongDescription: A small side-room for drinking coffee, complete with a humming kettle and a few mismatched stools.
Rooms.ExitText: You step out of the side-room.

Rooms.Name: closet
Rooms.LongDescription: A cramped and dark closet filled with the scent of dust and old mops. Shelves crowd the narrow walls.

Rooms.Name: dark world
Rooms.LongDescription: A secret place hidden behind the closet. The air here is still and the walls vanish into darkness.
Rooms.EnterText: You cross over into the dark world.
Rooms.ExitText: You slip away from the dark world.

Objects.Name: notice board
Objects.Description: A wooden board for leaving notes.
